summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2335, for the improvement of 16th Avenue Northeast and 17th Avenue Northeast, each from East 65th Street to East 75th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 24161 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
